import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {NgForm} from "@angular/forms"; import {AuthService} from "../auth.service"; import {User} from "../models/user"; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit{ authUser: User | undefined; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } submitEdit(userForm: NgForm) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.authUser = this.authService.getAuthUser(); console.log(this.authUser) } }
